get.description: Gets the data policy rules associated with the specified storage account.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: managementPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the Storage Account Management Policy. It should always be 'default'

put.description: Sets the data policy rules associated with the specified storage account.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: managementPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the Storage Account Management Policy. It should always be 'default'

requestBody.description: The data policy rules to set to a storage account.

delete.description: Deletes the data policy rules associated with the specified storage account.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: managementPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the Storage Account Management Policy. It should always be 'default'

204.description: No Content -- The management policies does not exist.

policy.description: The Storage Account ManagementPolicies Rules, in JSON format. See more details in: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/storage/common/storage-lifecycle-managment-concepts.

ManagementPoliciesRules.description: The Storage Account ManagementPolicies Rules, in JSON format. See more details in: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/storage/common/storage-lifecycle-managment-concepts.

ManagementPoliciesRulesSetParameter.description: The Storage Account ManagementPolicies Rules, in JSON format. See more details in: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/storage/common/storage-lifecycle-managment-concepts.

StorageAccountManagementPolicies.description: The Get Storage Account ManagementPolicies operation response.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

lastModifiedTime.description: Returns the date and time the ManagementPolicies was last modified.

StorageAccountManagementPoliciesRulesPro.description: The Storage Account Data Policies properties.

ManagementPolicyName.name: managementPolicyName
ManagementPolicyName.description: The name of the Storage Account Management Policy. It should always be 'default'
